body.p: A company interested in an analytic solution is "Data Science Enabled"once:

multiple_choice.choice: All current data sources have been identified and normalized.
Analytic objectives have been defined, and the data supports all objectives.

feedback.p: Incorrect; The company is data science ready but not enabled.
Correct; The organization is ready to use data science.

body.p: A company that measures the implementation of an AI-based analytic solution is considered:

multiple_choice.choice: AI Ready but not AI Enabled

feedback.p: Incorrect: A company is said to be AI Ready when its AI solution implemented but evaluation/measures are not yet finalized to consider its impact.
Correct: The organization has deployed the new software in a relevant context, and is able to directly measure the impact.
